alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 10:42AM PST until November 20 at 1:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected across the deserts and up to 60 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of southeast California. Portions of south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and motorcycles. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving high profile vehicles or motorcyles. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
